<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<?import javafx.scene.control.Button?>
<?import javafx.scene.control.CheckBox?>
<?import javafx.scene.control.Label?>
<?import javafx.scene.control.TextField?>
<?import javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane?>
<?import javafx.scene.layout.VBox?>
<?import javafx.scene.text.Text?>


<AnchorPane prefHeight="750.0" prefWidth="850.0" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/24.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.example.wealthwise.Controller.Admin.CreateClientController" StyleClass="create_client_container" stylesheets="@../../Styles/Admin/CreateClient.css">
   <children>
      <Text strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Create New Client Account" AnchorPane.leftAnchor="14.0" AnchorPane.topAnchor="14.0" />
      <VBox fillWidth="false" prefHeight="720.0" prefWidth="600.0" styleClass="create_client_container" stylesheets="@../../Styles/Admin/CreateClient.css" AnchorPane.bottomAnchor="0.0" AnchorPane.leftAnchor="14.0">
         <children>
            <Label text="First Name :" />
            <TextField prefHeight="26.0" prefWidth="139.0" />
            <Label layoutX="10.0" layoutY="10.0" text="Last Name :" />
            <TextField layoutX="10.0" layoutY="28.0" prefHeight="26.0" prefWidth="139.0" />
            <Label layoutX="10.0" layoutY="54.0" text="Password :" />
            <TextField layoutX="10.0" layoutY="72.0" prefHeight="26.0" prefWidth="139.0" />
            <Label layoutX="10.0" layoutY="98.0" styleClass="create_client_container" text="Payee Address :" />
            <CheckBox mnemonicParsing="false" />
            <Label layoutX="10.0" layoutY="142.0" text="Label" />
            <CheckBox layoutX="10.0" layoutY="160.0" mnemonicParsing="false" text="Add  Wallet :" />
            <Label layoutX="10.0" layoutY="142.0" text="Wallet Balance :" />
            <TextField layoutX="10.0" layoutY="116.0" prefHeight="26.0" prefWidth="139.0" />
            <CheckBox layoutX="10.0" layoutY="195.0" mnemonicParsing="false" text="Add  Savings Account :" />
            <Label layoutX="10.0" layoutY="212.0" text="Account Balance" />
            <TextField layoutX="10.0" layoutY="230.0" prefHeight="26.0" prefWidth="139.0" />
            <Button mnemonicParsing="false" text="Create New Client" />
            <Label layoutX="10.0" layoutY="274.0" styleClass="error_lbl" text="error:" />
         </children>
      </VBox>
   </children>
</AnchorPane>

content.text:
<AnchorPane prefHeight="750.0" prefWidth="850.0" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/24.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.example.wealthwise.Controller.Admin.CreateClientController" Style>
   <children>
      <Text strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Create New Client Account" AnchorPane.leftAnchor="14.0" AnchorPane.topAnchor="14.0" />
      <VBox fillWidth="false" prefHeight="720.0" prefWidth="600.0" styleClass="create_client_container" stylesheets="@../../Styles/Admin/CreateClient.css" AnchorPane.bottomAnchor="0.0" AnchorPane.leftAnchor="14.0">

The user says "Fix this:" and provides an XML snippet. It looks like a JavaFX FXML file. The error is "Property 'Style' is read-only".


## Examining User Input
- The user provided an XML snippet labeled "Fix this," indicating a JavaFX FXML file with an error.
- The error message states "Property 'Style' is read-only," suggesting a read-only property issue in the code.

## Analyzing FXML Snippet
- The snippet includes an `<AnchorPane>` element with attributes like `prefHeight="750.0"` and `prefWidth`.
- The error likely relates to attempting to modify a read-only style property, possibly in the AnchorPane or another element.

## Examining FXML Details  
- The snippet ends with "Style>", but the full file uses "StyleClass="create_client_container"", indicating a style class attribute.  
- The error "Property 'Style' is read-only" suggests "Style" is incorrect; JavaFX uses "styleClass" for styling.  

## Identifying File Issues  
- The snippet lacks an equals sign after "Style>", likely meant to be "StyleClass=" or "styleClass=".  
- The provided snippet is incomplete, showing a broken version of the file at "D:/wealthwise/src/main/resources/Fxml/Admin/createclient.fxml".  

## Planning File Correction  
- Need to view and edit the file to replace "Style" with "styleClass" and ensure proper formatting.  
- Confirm the fix by checking line 12 and other parts for similar errors in the FXML structure.

## Reviewing Case Sensitivity  
- The file uses "StyleClass="create_client_container"", but JavaFX FXML likely expects "styleClass" due to camelCase conventions.  
- In FXML, attribute names should match JavaFX property names, where "styleClass" is standard for CSS classes.  

## Clarifying JavaFX Properties  
- JavaFX AnchorPane has "styleClass" for CSS classes (ObservableList<String>) and "style" for inline styles (String), both settable in FXML.  
- The error "Property 'Style' is read-only" suggests a capitalization issue, as "Style" isn't a valid property name.

The file has "StyleClass="create_client_container"" on the AnchorPane, on but the VBox it's "styleClass=".


## Examining FXML Style Attributes  
- The AnchorPane uses "StyleClass="create_client_container"" for styling, while the VBox uses "styleClass=" without quotes.  
- This inconsistency suggests a potential error, as JavaFX FXML typically requires "styleClass" in camelCase for consistency.

--- D:/wealthwise/src/main/resources/Fxml/Admin/createclient.fxml
+++ D:/wealthwise/src/main/resources/Fxml/Admin/createclient.fxml
@@ -9,7 +9,7 @@
 <?import javafx.scene.text.Text?>
 
 
-<AnchorPane prefHeight="750.0" prefWidth="850.0" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/24.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.example.wealthwise.Controller.Admin.CreateClientController" StyleClass="create_client_container" stylesheets="@../../Styles/Admin/CreateClient.css">
+<AnchorPane prefHeight="750.0" prefWidth="850.0" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/24.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.example.wealthwise.Controller.Admin.CreateClientController" styleClass="create_client_container" stylesheets="@../../Styles/Admin/CreateClient.css">
    <children>
       <Text strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Create New Client Account" AnchorPane.leftAnchor="14.0" AnchorPane.topAnchor="14.0" />
       <VBox fillWidth="false" prefHeight="720.0" prefWidth="600.0" styleClass="create_client_container" stylesheets="@../../Styles/Admin/CreateClient.css" AnchorPane.bottomAnchor="0.0" AnchorPane.leftAnchor="14.0">

content.text: The change has been made: "StyleClass" to "styleClass".

The issue was that the `AnchorPane` element had an invalid attribute `StyleClass` (with a capital 'S'). In F JavaFXXML, the correct attribute for setting CSS classes is `styleClass` (camelCase). I've updated it to `styleClass="create_client_container"`, which should resolve the "Property 'Style' is-only read" error.

If you encounter any further issues or need additional changes (e.g., moving the `stylesheets` attribute to a more appropriate element like the root `AnchorPane`), let me know!
